select bpmanperiod_prdstart_day bpmanperiodPrdstartDay, bpmanperiod_value_day bpmanperiodValueDay, loanapplstatlog_value_day loanapplstatlogValueDay, timeunits_name timeunitsName, bpinnerproduct_ccode bpinnerproductCcode, bpinnerproduct_name bpinnerproductName, loanapplrb_deal_ref loanapplrbDealRef, salesplace_name salesplaceName, address_name addressName, address_ccode addressCcode FROM TABLE (pkg_nom_api.get_kpi_data3excel_new( p_Date_From => #{startDate}, p_Date_Till => #{endDate}, p_TimeUnit_ID => #{timeUnitId} ))
